entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Sparwood
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow or periods of rain this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm near Fernie. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:59 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:59 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm except 4 cm near Fernie. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 6:59 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022
